name: Professor Francis Upham
occupation: Professor of Folklore & Languages, Miskatonic University
traits: Ambitious, charming, and a bit of a social climber. Eager to please those in power.
motivation: To gain tenure and be accepted into Arkham's high society.
secret: He is a recent, eager initiate of the Silver Twilight Lodge, using his academic position to research occult rituals for them in exchange for social advancement. He doesn't yet understand what he's truly involved in.
hook: The investigators need a text translated or are researching local legends.
